title: Prologue to a new play call'd The disappointment, or, The mother in fashion spoken by Mr. Betterton.
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
notes: Attributed to John Dryden. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
"Epilogue by another hand" is by the Hon. John Stafford: p. [2].
The play was written by Thomas Southerne.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
